class.name: planar_bot_control/RMRCController
class.description: The RMRC controller moves the robot to a task space goal by minimizing null space motion. It expects an EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: planar_bot_control/ASCController
class.description: The ASC controller moves the robot to a task space goal while moving in null space along the negative gradient of a cost function. It expects an EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.
